definitions.title: vb. denom. Hiph.
definitions.body: (?), smell, perceive odour; -Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇרִיחַ]] Job 39:25, [[יׇרַח]] 1Sa 26:19 + 2 t.; [[וַיׇּ֫רַח]] Ge 8:21; 3 mpl. [[יְרִיחָוּן]] Ps 115:6, [[יְרִיחָֻן]] De 4:28, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הָרִיחַ]] Ex 30:38, etc.;—smell, c. acc. Ge 8:21, Ge 27:27 (JE), 1Sa 26:19; abs. De 4:28, Ps 115:6; metaph. [[בּהֲרִיחוֹ אֵשׁ]] Ju Jdg 16:9, [[יׇרִיחַ]] [[מִלְחָמָה]] Job 39:25 the horse scenteh battle; c. [[ב]] Ex 30:38, Le 26:31 (both P); metaph. = delight in Am 5:21, Is 11:3 (prob. dittogr. Br:MP 202).
